TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebFailureAuditEvent extends System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent

summary.span: 提供關於安全性失敗的資訊。

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓管理已部署的 Web 應用程式的生產環境和作業人員。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健全狀況事件類型。The namespace contains the health event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 安全性作業失敗時，會使用類別。The class is used when a security operation fails. 這個範例是 URL 授權 Web 要求失敗。An example of this is a failed URL authorization for a Web request. 根據預設，ASP.NET 設定引發事件的下列功能：By default, ASP.NET is configured to raise the event for the following features: - 檔案授權。File authorization. 只使用 Windows 身分識別與要求相關聯時，ASP.NET 會嘗試檔案授權。ASP.NET attempts file authorization only when a Windows Identity is associated with the request. 相關的事件稽核的程式碼。The related event audit code is . - URL 授權。URL authorization. 此管理未經授權的嘗試存取的 URL 資源。This governs unauthorized attempts to access a URL resource. 失敗的嘗試，由匿名使用者不會進行稽核，所以在大部分情況下可接受匿名驗證失敗。Failed attempts by an anonymous user are not audited, because anonymous authentication failure is acceptable in most circumstances. 相關的事件稽核的程式碼。The related event audit code is . - 一般未處理或安全性未處理的狀況。Generic unhandled or security unhandled conditions. 以下是這些狀況相關的事件代碼的清單：The following is a list of the event codes related to these conditions: - - - - - 當就會引發事件、 相關的稽核失敗事件引發效能計數器，然後檢查 ASP.NET 健康監視遞增`healthMonitoring`組態區段，以判斷任何提供者是否訂閱事件。When a event is raised, ASP.NET health monitoring increments the related Audit Failure Events Raised performance counter and then checks the `healthMonitoring` configuration section to determine whether any providers subscribe to the event. 如果提供者訂閱事件時，ASP.NET 會分派處理它們的事件。If providers subscribe to the event, ASP.NET dispatches the event to them for processing. > [!NOTE] > 若要檢視系統監視器 (PerfMon) 中的 稽核失敗事件引發 效能計數器中**新增計數器**視窗中，選取**ASP.NET**從**效能物件**下拉式清單中，選取**稽核失敗事件引發** 效能計數器，然後按一下**新增** 按鈕。To view the Audit Failure Events Raised performance counter in System Monitor (PerfMon), in the **Add Counters** window, select **ASP.NET** from the **Performance object** drop-down list, select the **Audit Failure Events Raised** performance counter, and click the **Add** button. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 應用程式使用 「 系統監視器 (PerfMon)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=36882) MSDN 上的 IIS 文件。For more information, see [Using the System Monitor (PerfMon) with ASP.NET Applications](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=36882) in the IIS documentation on MSDN. > [!NOTE] > 在大部分情況下您將能夠實作時，使用 ASP.NET 健康監視類型，而您會藉由指定的值控制健全狀況監視系統`healthMonitoring`組態區段。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 您也可以衍生自健全狀況監視類型的類型來建立您自己的自訂事件和提供者。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 如需範例衍生自類別，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節。For an example of deriving from the class, see the Example section. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從衍生類別來建立自訂的稽核事件。The following code example demonstrates how to derive from the class to create a custom audit event. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent/CS/webfailureauditevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent/VB/webfailureauditevent.vb#1)] 下列組態摘錄示範如何啟用 ASP.NET 使用事件。The following configuration excerpt shows how to enable ASP.NET to use the event. ``` ```

para.span: 當格式化顯示您自訂的事件資訊，會覆寫方法而非方法。

span.span: When formatting your custom event information for display, override the method rather than the method.

para.span: 這會避免覆寫或竄改機密的系統資訊。

span.span: This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視系統會在內部使用這個建構函式。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 您永遠不會使用它來建立的執行個體，但是實作您自己的事件類型繼承自這個類別時，您可以呼叫這個建構函式。You will never use it to create an instance of , but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫這個建構函式中`SampleWebFailureAuditEvent`類別。The following code example shows how to call this constructor in the `SampleWebFailureAuditEvent` class. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent/CS/webfailureauditevent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent/VB/webfailureauditevent.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視系統會在內部使用這個建構函式。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 您永遠不會使用它來建立的執行個體，但是實作您自己的事件類型繼承自這個類別時，您可以呼叫這個建構函式。You will never use it to create an instance of , but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫這個建構函式中`SampleWebFailureAuditEvent`類別。The following code example shows how to call this constructor in the `SampleWebFailureAuditEvent` class. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent/CS/webfailureauditevent.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent/VB/webfailureauditevent.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void IncrementPerfCounters() cil managed

summary.span: 遞增 [引發的稽核失敗事件] 效能計數器。

span.span: Increments the Audit Failure Events Raised performance counter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 稽核失敗事件引發的效能計數器會追蹤因為應用程式啟動失敗的稽核事件的數目。The Audit Failure Events Raised performance counter tracks the number of failed audit events raised since the application started. 這個方法也會呼叫父方法，引發事件的計數器會遞增。This method also calls the parent method, which increments the Events Raised counter. 這個計數器會追蹤所引發的事件總數。This counter tracks the total number of events raised. 若要檢視在 [系統監視器 (PerfMon)，這些效能計數器中**新增計數器**視窗選取**ASP.NET**從**效能物件**下拉式清單中，選取您想要檢視，然後按一下效能計數器**新增**] 按鈕。To view these performance counters in System Monitor (PerfMon), in the **Add Counters** window select **ASP.NET** from the **Performance object** drop-down list, select the performance counter you want to view, and click the **Add** button. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 應用程式使用 「 系統監視器 (PerfMon)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=36882) MSDN 上的 IIS 文件。For more information, see [Using the System Monitor (PerfMon) with ASP.NET Applications](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=36882) in the IIS documentation on MSDN.
